# Wail of Doom (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]], [[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous + 1 round/level or 1 round; see text

S**aving Throw:** Will partial; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 233

*You unleash a terrible cry of malice and anger. The very air darkens with black energy as your cry echoes away from you.*

Anyone caught in the area of this spell suffers excruciating pain and becomes demoralized. Each creature takes 1d4 points of damage per caster level (maximum 15d4) and becomes [[Panicked|panicked]] for 1 round per caster level. A successful Will save halves the damage, reduces the [[Panicked|panicked]] effect to [[Shaken|shaken]], and reduces the duration of the [[Shaken|shaken]] effect to 1 round.
